questions.header: Q1: What Would You Bring To A Concert?

statements.color: Noise-canceling headphones and a notepad.
Biodegradable moon boots and a reusable water bottle
VIP access, nerve gas and a plan to leave early.
Ear protection, a printed schedule, and a clear understanding of the venue rules.
Fireworks!!!
A device calibrated to record, analyze, and possibly survive the concert.

questions.header: Q2: After A Long Work Week, How Do You Spend The Week End?

statements.color: Calculate the most optimized way of eating chili cheese.
Go for a hike in the closest nature reserve, weather conditions doesn't bother you.
Indulge yourself in dreaming of ways how to murder some of your colleagues.
Finish the things I didn’t get to during the week.
Buy all the snacks and eat as many as possible at the same time, while simultaniously having sex and watching 3 movies.
Power down nonessential processes and travel to an alternate dimension.

questions.header: Q3: Your Friend Feels Down — How Do You Try To Cheer Them Up?

statements.color: I help them reframe the situation so it makes more sense. For example telling them to play more instant speed. It always helps.
I reassure them that this pain is part of being alive through nonverbal grunting. It always helps.
I validate their feelings and then help them pursue their vendetta. It always helps.
I remind them they’re not alone and that things will be okay if they do the right thing. It always helps.
I tell them to scream it out and dance around a big pyre. It always helps.
I pierce their mind, identify the source of distress and remove it from existance. It always helps.

questions.header: Q4: You're Stranded On A Small Island, But Managed To Bring One Thing. What Would It Be?

statements.color: A comprehensive reference book.
A 'Home Sweet Home' sign.
Cyanide. I have better things to do.
A shaving kit. One musn't succumb to savagery.
Fire
Nothing, I would just rip a whole in reality and stroll out of there.

questions.header: Q5: Your Making A Character For A DnD Group. What Class Do You Choose?

statements.color: Wizard, Enchantment school. For obvious reasons..
Druid, I'm gonna ask them if we can play outside too..
Wizard, subclass Necromancer..
Cleric, someone needs to keep everyone else alive..
Sorcerer! Wildmagic! Fireball!
I'll make 100+ characters, because I'm a forever DM...

questions.header: Q6: What Would You Prefer To Have For Dinner Tonight?

statements.color: Something I haven’t tried before. But I'm gonna need about 20 minutes to fiure it out.
A leafy salad with some nuts and roots. Or just a deer.
Meat, very rare. Or just blood.
The meal doesn't matter aslong as i have nice company!
One piece or scorched anything please, on the double!
Nutritionally complete sustenance.

questions.header: Q7: If You Would Learn A New Instrument, What Would It Be?

statements.color: The synthesizer
The drums.
A bone flute.
The conductor's baton
The electric guitar.
A machine that produces sound on command.
